A Milestone in Learning & Growth

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1434&user=10620> 	

Last week, we celebrated more than just a graduation we honoured a powerful moment of growth, transformation, and shared purpose. 198 incredible graduates in the UAE walked the stage, each one a symbol of determination, development, and a commitment to retail excellence. Every programme completed was more than a course it was a story of personal and professional evolution.

Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1434&user=10620>
